scripts.recordDashboardTest: npm run allTests -- --record --key a6e4b9c1-618d-44fb-b539-d7b4624482c8 --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:lms: npx cypress run --record --key a6e4b9c1-618d-44fb-b539-d7b4624482c8 --spec cypress\e2e\LMS\Sprint-13\MasterManagement.js --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:lms-prod: npx cypress run --record --key a6e4b9c1-618d-44fb-b539-d7b4624482c8 --spec cypress\e2e\LMS-Prod\**\*.js --env allure=true --browser chrome --headed
scripts.cy:erp: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/ERP/**/*.js --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.posttest: (npm run allure:report) && (npm run allure:history || npm run allure:report && allure open)
scripts.lms: npm run cy:lms && npm run posttest
scripts.lms-prod: npm run cy:lms-prod && npm run posttest
scripts.erp: npm run cy:erp && npm run posttest
